project.description: Extracts changes from CI and Commits declarative changes into SVN

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: SalesforceUsername
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: The Username for the Destination Salesforce Environment

hudson.model.PasswordParameterDefinition.name: SalesforcePassword
hudson.model.PasswordParameterDefinition.description: The Username AND Security Token for the destination Environment

hudson.tasks.Ant.properties: sf.username = $SalesforceUsername sf.password = $SalesforcePassword sf.serverurl = https://test.salesforce.com sf.retrieveTarget = src sf.packageLocation = package/package.xml

hudson.tasks.Shell.command: cd src/profiles svn status svn --username $SVNUSER --password $SVNPASS commit -m 'Auto commit from Jenkins profile Change'
cd src/permissionsets svn status svn --username $SVNUSER --password $SVNPASS commit -m 'Auto commit from Jenkins PermissionSet Change'
cd src/workflows svn status svn --username $SVNUSER --password $SVNPASS commit -m 'Auto commit from Jenkins Workflow Change'
cd src/layouts svn status svn --username $SVNUSER --password $SVNPASS commit -m 'Auto commit from Jenkins Layouts Change'
cd src/objects svn status svn --username $SVNUSER --password $SVNPASS commit -m 'Auto commit from Jenkins Objects Change'
cd src/queues svn status svn --username $SVNUSER --password $SVNPASS commit -m 'Auto commit from Jenkins Queues Change'
svn add --force src/groups cd src/groups svn status svn --username $SVNUSER --password $SVNPASS commit -m 'Auto commit from Jenkins Groups Change'
cd src/settings svn status svn --username $SVNUSER --password $SVNPASS commit -m 'Auto commit from Jenkins Settings Change'
cd src/assignmentRules svn status svn --username $SVNUSER --password $SVNPASS commit -m 'Auto commit from Jenkins assignmentRules Change'
cd src/applications svn status svn --username $SVNUSER --password $SVNPASS commit -m 'Auto commit from Jenkins app Changes'
cd src/documents svn status svn --username $SVNUSER --password $SVNPASS commit -m 'Auto commit from Jenkins documents Changes'
cd src/approvalProcesses svn status svn --username $SVNUSER --password $SVNPASS commit -m 'Auto commit from Jenkins approvalProcesses Changes'
cd src/assignmentRules svn status svn --username $SVNUSER --password $SVNPASS commit -m 'Auto commit from Jenkins assignmentRules Changes'
cd src/reportTypes svn status svn --username $SVNUSER --password $SVNPASS commit -m 'Auto commit from Jenkins reportTypes Changes'
